1112760.name: Farrealm: The Prince of Winds
1112760.description:
Farrealm: The Prince of Winds is an Open-World, 3rd-Person, Action-Adventure game featuring exploration, combat, puzzle-solving and platforming.

Explore Farrealm as Almex, the prince of winds, to unravel the world's history in time to save it from destruction. Enjoy vaulting through the open world and hanging from its cavernous underbelly as you solve puzzles and combat giant foes!

PLEASE NOTE: This product was a large-scale, individually developed project. As such, it is likely to still have a number of technical issues, which were originally meant to be handled post-release via free updates. This was not intended to be the final build. However, contrary to our original intent, there is no longer an update in development to resolve technical issues with this project. Various issues have forced us to put this project aside until further notice.
1112760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
